016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockConfigurableNavigationHandler;
019import de.cuioss.tools.reflect.FieldWrapper;
020import jakarta.faces.application.*;
021import jakarta.faces.context.ExternalContext;
022import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
023import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
024import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
025import org.apache.myfaces.test.config.ResourceBundleVarNames;
026import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockApplication20;
027import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockHttpServletRequest;
028import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockServletContext;
029
030import java.util.Collection;
031import java.util.Locale;
032import java.util.ResourceBundle;
033
034/**
035 * Helper class acting as runtime-registry for {@link ResourceBundle},
036 * {@link NavigationHandler},
037 *
038 * @author Oliver Wolff
039 */
040@RequiredArgsConstructor
041public class ApplicationConfigDecorator {
042
043    private final Application application;
044    private final FacesContext facesContext;
045
046    private static Object getMockApplicationInstance(final Application application) {
047        if (application instanceof MockApplication20) {
048            return application;
049        }
050        if (application instanceof ApplicationWrapper wrapper) {
051            return getMockApplicationInstance(wrapper.getWrapped());
052        }
053        return application;
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Registers a {@link ResourceBundle} to a given name
058     *
059     * @param bundleName the name of the bundle to be registered to
060     * @param bundlePath the path to the {@link ResourceBundle}
061     * @return the {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
062     * fluent-api style usage
063     */
064    public ApplicationConfigDecorator registerResourceBundle(final String bundleName, final String bundlePath) {
065        ResourceBundleVarNames.addVarName(bundleName, bundlePath);
066        return this;
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Registers the supported {@link Locale}s, see
071     * {@link Application#setSupportedLocales(Collection)}
072     *
073     * @param locales to be registered
074     * @return the {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
075     * fluent-api style usage
076     */
077    public ApplicationConfigDecorator registerSupportedLocales(final Collection<Locale> locales) {
078        application.setSupportedLocales(locales);
079        return this;
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * Registers the default {@link Locale}, see
084     * {@link Application#setDefaultLocale(Locale)}
085     *
086     * @param locale to be registered
087     * @return the {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
088     * fluent-api style usage
089     */
090    public ApplicationConfigDecorator registerDefaultLocale(final Locale locale) {
091        application.setDefaultLocale(locale);
092        return this;
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * Register a navigation case in a simple way, with two parameter only
097     *
098     * @param outcome  to be registered
099     * @param toViewId to be registered
100     * @return the {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
101     * fluent-api style usage
102     */
103    public ApplicationConfigDecorator registerNavigationCase(final String outcome, final String toViewId) {
104        getMockNavigationHandler().addNavigationCase(outcome,
105            new NavigationCase(null, null, outcome, null, toViewId, null, null, true, true));
106        return this;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * @return an instance of {@link CuiMockConfigurableNavigationHandler} If not
111     * already configured this method will implicitly register a new
112     * instance
113     */
114    public CuiMockConfigurableNavigationHandler getMockNavigationHandler() {
115        if (!(application.getNavigationHandler() instanceof CuiMockConfigurableNavigationHandler)) {
116            application.setNavigationHandler(new CuiMockConfigurableNavigationHandler());
117        }
118        return (CuiMockConfigurableNavigationHandler) application.getNavigationHandler();
119    }
120
121    /**
122     * Sets the {@link ProjectStage}. Caution: this method uses hardcore reflection
123     * to access the field with the name "_projectStage", may therefore be fragile.
124     *
125     * @param projectStage to be set
126     * @return the {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
127     * fluent-api style usage
128     */
129    public ApplicationConfigDecorator setProjectStage(final ProjectStage projectStage) {
130        var projectStageField = FieldWrapper.from(MockApplication20.class, "_projectStage");
131        if (projectStageField.isEmpty()) {
132            throw new IllegalStateException("Unable to set projectStage, due to underlying Exception");
133        }
134        projectStageField.get().writeValue(getMockApplicationInstance(application), projectStage);
135        return this;
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Sets the contextPath in {@link HttpServletRequest}
140     *
141     * @param contextPath to be set
142     * @return the {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
143     * fluent-api style usage
144     */
145    public ApplicationConfigDecorator setContextPath(final String contextPath) {
146        ((MockHttpServletRequest) facesContext.getExternalContext().getRequest()).setContextPath(contextPath);
147        return this;
148    }
149
150    /**
151     * Registers a concrete InitParameter to
152     * {@link ExternalContext#getInitParameterMap()}
153     *
154     * @param key   used as the key for the
155     *              {@link ExternalContext#getInitParameterMap()}
156     * @param value used as the value for the
157     *              {@link ExternalContext#getInitParameterMap()}
158     * @return the {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
159     * fluent-api style usage
160     */
161    public ApplicationConfigDecorator addInitParameter(final String key, final String value) {
162        var context = (MockServletContext) facesContext.getExternalContext().getContext();
163        context.addInitParameter(key, value);
164        return this;
165    }
166
167}
